content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Chenoweth-Hage makes to develop her argument that grizzly bears should not be introduced to Idaho under the protection of the Endangered Species Act.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Chenoweth-Hage makes to develop her argument that grizzly bears should not be introduced to Idaho under the protection of the Endangered Species Act.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
